features: ✈️ Hands-free Convenience: Keep your phone within reach and in sight, whether you're on a plane, at your desk, or working out at the gym.
✈️ Versatile Mounting: The strong clamp can attach to tables, luggage handles, gym equipment, and more, up to 1.5 inches wide.
✈️ Flexible Viewing: Dual joints with 360-degree rotation allow for the best viewing angle, whether you prefer vertical or horizontal orientation.
✈️ Fits Most Phones: Compatible with a wide range of phone sizes, from the iPhone Mini to the Samsung Note 20 Plus.
✈️ Satisfaction guaranteed: We stand behind our quality products and offer a 30-day free return policy. Try it out for yourself.
🎁 Recommended by 500,000+ travel enthusiasts. This versatile and practical accessory makes it a perfect gift for family, friends or colleagues for any occasion. 😉
💡 Other uses of this phone holder: video call for work; holding phone for group photo; taking time lapse photographic; filming videos; desktop headphone holder.

❗ Please note certain larger phones with thick protective cases might not fit this mount properly. Also, accessories like phone wallets on the back of your phone can interfere with the phone holder's function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile, Sturdy and Makes Your Phone More Useful
reviews.reviewText: Very Good Quality and folds up nicely. I like to watch videos on my phone and this makes it much more enjoyable. Can sit back and relax and put on a coffee table etc. I even enjoy holding it and watching the videos - can tilt the phone and be more comfortable than just holding the phone. I also like to use it to take photos with my phone - put phone on timer and take group photos. One thing that would have been nice would have been to include a thread on the base so could attach to a tripod - but no big deal, just a potential improvement. Very nice accessory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HIGH recommendation for the best comfort for the flight!
reviews.reviewText: It is a versatile and intelligent product. Small and easy to take everywhere. It gives me comfort to watch on my cell phone on long flights during the week and security that when I doze off my cell phone won't fall. I also use it a lot at home, for video calls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Loud adjustments but useful travel gadget!
reviews.reviewText: I fly a lot commercially for work and a lot of times, whatever airline I used sometimes didn't have what I wanted to watch for inflight entertainment. This gadget works on most seatbacks and it's highly adaptable to whatever you're trying to mount this on. I've clipped this to the top of my work laptop to watch movies while we fly aerial LiDAR and it has never been shaken loose. I've tried mounting this on my boyfriends carry on roller bag and it worked great and I was able to finish a tv episode on it. This mount is well made, incredibly sturdy and stable. It's compact size allows me to easily shove it into a front pocket of my backpack. I do wish this was quieter when you're adjusting it to the angle you want. It "clicks" very loudly which drew attention from other passengers to what I was doing. A few flight attendants have complimented me on this cool device. I stow it before takeoff and before landing and have never had any issue with using it on a flight. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Loved this gadget. Much easier to watch movies and store your phone in a save place when traveling. Easy to mount on and can turn in all directions. Definitely recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Game changer for long flights!
reviews.reviewText: So, I recently got my hands on the Perilogics Universal in-Flight Airplane Phone Holder Mount, and it's been a total game-changer for my travel experience. Here's why I'm giving it a solid 5-star rating:First off, this thing is seriously versatile. It fits just about any phone size you can think of, which is awesome. No matter what phone I'm carrying, this holder has got it covered. And adjusting it to the perfect angle for watching movies or working is a breeze.The multi-directional rotation is a neat feature. I can twist and turn it to find the ideal viewing angle, which means no more awkward neck craning on those long flights. It's all about comfort and convenience with this little guy.But what really impressed me is how securely it holds onto your phone. Even during some pretty turbulent flights, I've never worried about my phone falling. It latches onto the tray table or seatback pocket like a champ.And when the flight's over, it folds up nice and compact. I can toss it in my carry-on bag without a second thought, and it doesn't take up much space.In a nutshell, the Perilogics Universal in-Flight Airplane Phone Holder Mount is a total game-changer for travelers like me. It's user-friendly, sturdy, and super practical. If you're someone who loves to stay entertained or get work done during flights, this thing is a must-have. Trust me; you won't regret it.So, do yourself a favor and grab one of these bad boys. It's a traveler's best friend, and I can't recommend it enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is my favorite phone holder for travel
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this phone holder for years on planes. I like to watch movies on the plane, but I prefer to have movies downloaded to my phone rather than use the back-of-seat screens (which aren't always present) where every little announcement interrupts what you're watching. This holder clips onto the tray table very well. (I pull one of the rubber cushions off of the clamp, which lets me clamp to the tray table even when it's folded back into the seat in front of me.) And it folds down nice and small when I need to pack it back up.I like this holder so well that when I (tragically) left mine in a plane (I think), I ordered a new one as soon as I had phone service again. I love this thing.I also find it useful to clip this holder to the edge of my desk when I'm at work. Sometimes conferencing on my phone just makes using my computer during the meeting easier. This bracket is very versatile for many uses in various situations.This thing works for me so well that when I (tragically) left it on the plane during a recent trip, I immediately ordered a new one once I had phone service again. So I strongly and confidently recommend this phone holder to anyone in need of such a thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I fly often for work and this holder works great for watching TV on my phone at eye level. I also got one for my daughters car and she mounted it to her dash for navugation purposes and it holds her device very steady and works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works As Advertised So Far
reviews.reviewText: More sturdy than I expected. Once you try folding it a few times it is easy to learn there a various configurations that can be useful. Compact & handy. These are just observations after opening, viewing quality and trying it out several places. Have not used on a plane yet and remains to be seen how well it holds up over time after opening, closing and moving it around in multiple positions. Thus far, looks & works as advertised.
If you have an iPhone and travel, you really need to consider this. It provides an excellent way to make greater and more convenient use of your phone. It has worked very well.
Lo compre para un vuelo largo y funciono tal cual se especifica, será un practico accesorio de viaje.
Dei de presente e me arrependi de não ter comprado um igual.

I purchased this for a recent trip. It’s a great little gadget, but slightly noisy to adjust. After set up, you no longer have to maneuver. I recommend the product. I will continue to use it when I fly.
